i18n.unsupportedLocale: the requested locale is not supported

start.title: Consent to the release of information
start.disclaimer: I hereby authorize the release of all information contained in this form to the AME and, where necessary, to the medical assessor of the licensing authority. I am aware that such information will become and remain property of the licensing authority, provided that I or my physician will have access to them according to national laws. Medical confidentiality will be respected at all times.

form.info: Fill in the following fields. Information will be stored locally on your device.
